plot: Estranged twin brothers haven't heard from each other for over a year - while one secludes and plans to spend the New Year's eve alone, the other intends to do whatever it takes to take him out...
title: Why Won't You Hug Your Brother
plot_es: Estranged twin brothers haven't heard from each other for over a year - while one secludes and plans to spend the New Year's eve alone, the other intends to do whatever it takes to take him out...
original_name: Why Won't You Hug Your Brother
plot_en: Estranged twin brothers haven't heard from each other for over a year - while one secludes and plans to spend the New Year's eve alone, the other intends to do whatever it takes to take him out...
